verbs.description: < p > Construction on a section of President Trump 's [V: planned] [ARG1: wall] along the U.S .- Mexico border began Friday in San Diego , according to local media.</p >

< p > [ARG1: Construction on a section of President Trump 's planned wall along the U.S .- Mexico border] [V: began] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARGM-LOC: in San Diego] , [ARGM-ADV: according to local] media.</p >
< p > Construction on a section of President Trump 's planned wall along the U.S .- Mexico border began Friday in San Diego , [V: according] to local media.</p >
